tool_description: Bol Scraper is a powerful tool for retrieving detailed product information from Bol.com, a leading online marketplace. With this API, you can easily access essential product details by providing the EAN (European Article Number) code associated with the product.
name: Bol Products By Ean Code
title: Bol Products By Ean Code

api_list.name: EAN CODE
api_list.description: Get Product details from bol.com using ean code.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bol-products-by-ean-code.p.rapidapi.com/ean/0194253408253"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bol-products-by-ean-code.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bol-products-by-ean-code.p.rapidapi.com/ean/{ean_code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bol-products-by-ean-code.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
